  • Method Details

    • login

      @POST @Path("/login") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response login(@FormParam("username") String username, @FormParam("password") String password)
      Logins a user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      a response with a cookie if the login was successful, otherwise a response with a status code of 401
      Since:
      0.1
